R

registerObserver(Observer) - Method in class main.input.ProjectService
Adds an observer to the list of active observers.
registerObserver(Observer) - Method in interface observer.Subject
Registers a new Observer to observe this Subject.
RegularPolygon - Class in shapes
Represents a regular Polygon on the canvas.
RegularPolygon() - Constructor for class shapes.RegularPolygon
Creates a new RegularPolygon with default attributes.
RegularPolygon(int) - Constructor for class shapes.RegularPolygon
Creates a new RegularPolygon with the specified attributes and default Circle attributes.
removeObserver(Observer) - Method in class main.input.ProjectService
Removes an observer from the list of active observers.
removeObserver(Observer) - Method in interface observer.Subject
Removes an Observer from the list of Observers observing this Subject.
RequestAddLayer - Class in messages
This class will get useful later on in the project.
RequestAddShape - Class in messages
This class is used to store data of the request from the client if addShape in RESTHandler gets called and the user wants to add a Shape.
RequestDeleteLayer - Class in messages
This class is used to store data of the request from the client if deleteLayer in RESTHandler gets called and the user wants to delete a Layer.
RequestDeleteLayer(int) - Constructor for class messages.RequestDeleteLayer
The constructor assigns the JSON Property to the class attribute layerIndex, which indicates the layer which should get deleted.
RequestDeleteShape - Class in messages
This class is used to store data of the request from the client if deleteShape in RESTHandler gets called and the user wants to delete a Shape.
RequestDeleteShape(int, int) - Constructor for class messages.RequestDeleteShape
The constructor assigns the JSON Property to the class attributes layerIndex and shapeIndex, which indicates the shape which should get deleted.
RequestEditCanvas - Class in messages
This class is used to store data of the request from the client if editCanvas in RESTHandler gets called and the user wants to edit the Canvas.
RequestEditCanvas(double, double) - Constructor for class messages.RequestEditCanvas
The constructor assigns the JSON Property to the class attributes width and height, which indicate the new desired values of the canvas.
RequestEditLayer - Class in messages
This class is used to store data of the request from the client if editLayer in RESTHandler gets called and the user wants to toggle the visibility.
RequestEditShape - Class in messages
This class is used to store data of the request from the client if editShape in RESTHandler gets called and the user wants to change the Shape.
RequestEditShape(int, int, Shape) - Constructor for class messages.RequestEditShape
The constructor assigns the JSON Property to the class attributes layerIndex and shapeIndex and Shape, which indicates which Shape should get changed on which Layer and with which parameters.
Response - Class in messages
This abstract class holds a projectID to specify to which project/client/user the response belongs.
Response() - Constructor for class messages.Response
 
RESTHandler - Class in main.input
Primary class responsible for communication between the client and the server.
RESTHandler(ProjectService) - Constructor for class main.input.RESTHandler
 
RGBColour - Class in facilitators
Represents a Colour in form of the RGB Code.
RGBColour(byte, byte, byte) - Constructor for class facilitators.RGBColour
This constructor takes the 3 values in byte.
RGBColour(String) - Constructor for class facilitators.RGBColour
Constructor which expects RGB code in hexadecimal in String because HTML sends it in Hex.
